text:
="preserve">Mario Giacinto Donatone (9 June 1933 – 14 April 2020) was an Italian actor. He was born in Tripoli, Libya to Italian parents. He was known for his role as Mosca in "The Godfather Part III". He also starred in "Phenomena" and '.
Donatone died in Rome on 14 April 2020 at the age of 86.
